available.description: Section header for items that can be added

bold.description: Font style option for bold text

cancel.description: title or textContent for buttons that prevent the current action from executing

cancel_close.description: title or textContent for the close button of modals

chosen.description: Section header for items that have been selected

cmd_export_all.message: Show the modal to export all saved Tabs
cmd_export_all.description: [command description] the user wants to export all Tabs

cmd_import.message: Show the modal to import new Tabs
cmd_import.description: [command description] the user wants to import new Tabs

cmd_open_other_org.message: Show the modal to open the current page in another Org
cmd_open_other_org.description: [command description] the user wants to open the current page in another Org

cmd_remove_tab.message: Remove the current page from the Tab list (if saved)
cmd_remove_tab.description: [command description] the user wants to remove the current page

cmd_save_as_tab.message: Save the current page in the Tab list (if not saved)
cmd_save_as_tab.description: [command description] the user wants to save the current page

cmd_toggle_org.message: Toggle the current page's Org value (if saved)
cmd_toggle_org.description: [command description] the user wants to toggle the Org for the current page

cmd_update_tab.message: Show modal to update current page (if saved)
cmd_update_tab.description: [command description] the user wants to update the current page

confirm_another_org.description: [open-other-org-modal] request confirmation to the user to open the constructed link.

confirm_update_extension.message: A new version of $extension_label is now available!
confirm_update_extension.description: an unknown message has been received from a listener

continue.description: textContent for buttons that allow the current action to execute

delete_all.description: [popup] title on the bin to empty all Tabs

drop.description: [import] let the user drop their files onto the specified area

error_adding_tab.description: [error] Generic error used while adding a Tab

error_check_update.description: [error] generic error while checking for extension updates

error_close_other_modal.description: [toast] The user tried to open more than 1 modal

error_cxm_check.description: [error] the context menu items could not be found

error_cxm_create.description: [error] the context menu items could not be initialized

error_cxm_remove.description: [error] the context menu items could not be eliminated

error_expand_url.description: [error] the url to expand was not passed

error_expand_url_no_base.message: Cannot expand a URL without its host!
error_expand_url_no_base.description: [error] the base url used to expand was not passed

error_extract_empty_url.message: Cannot extract org name from empty URL!
error_extract_empty_url.description: [error] the url from which to retrieve the org name was not passed

error_failed_sync.description: [error] Generic error when the Tabs could not get synced from the user

error_failed_to_fetch.description: [error] The call to an external website did not succeed

error_get_with_no_org.message: Cannot get Tabs if Org is not specified.
error_get_with_no_org.description: [error] tried to search tabs by org without sending org information

error_import.description: [error] there was an error during the import process

error_invalid_key.message: The key parameter passed to the function is not valid
error_invalid_key.description: [error] the developer tried to call a function with an invalid parameter

error_invalid_request.description: [error] Generic error after getting a badly formatted message

error_link_with_id.message: This page could not exist in another Org, because it contains an Id!
error_link_with_id.description: [open-other-org-modal] warning for the user that the link may not exist in another org

error_minify_url.description: [error] the url to reduce was not passed

error_missing_favourite_id.message: Cannot get favourite image without the Id

error_missing_key.description: [error] no translation found in the files

error_no_array.message: Invalid array or no array was passed
error_no_array.description: [error] did not receive a valid array

error_no_browser_tab.message: Could not find current browser tab.
error_no_browser_tab.description: [error] background page could not establish an active browser tab

error_no_callback.description: [error] function to call at the end of the method was not passed

error_no_data.description: [error] tried to get a Tab without sending data

error_no_headers.description: [error] The extension could not find where to put the favourite button

error_no_matching_tab.message: Did not find any matching Tabs.

error_no_message.message: Did not specify a message to send.
error_no_message.description: [error] no message was found to be sent to other parts of the code

error_no_setup_tab.description: [error] The extension could not find where to put the favourite Tabs.

error_no_url.description: [error] the url to check was not passed

error_not_initialized.description: [error] Generic error for when a variable is not ready

error_processing_tabs.description: [error] Generic error when processing the Tabs

error_redirect.message: Cannot redirect. Please refresh the page.

error_remove_not_favourite.message: Cannot remove a non favourite Tab!
error_remove_not_favourite.description: [error] the user tried to remove a Tab which was not saved yet

error_removing_all_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing all Tabs

error_removing_generic_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing generic Tabs

error_removing_other_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing other Tabs

error_removing_tab.description: [error] Generic error used while removing a Tab

error_removing_visible_tabs.message: Error when removing all visible Tabs.
error_removing_visible_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing all visible Tabs

error_required_params.message: The required parameters for the function were not passed
error_required_params.description: [error] the developer tried to call a function without the necessary parameters

error_resetting_default_tabs.message: Error when resetting to default Tabs.
error_resetting_default_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while resetting the Tabs to their default

error_tab_constructor.message: Use Tab.create() instead of new Tab()
error_tab_constructor.description: [error] tell the developer how to use the Tab class

error_tab_label.message: Label must be a non-empty string
error_tab_label.description: [error] user tried to create a Tab without a label

error_tab_not_found.description: [error] the Tab was not included in the array

error_tab_object_creation.message: When calling with an object, do not pass anything else.

error_tab_org.message: Org must be a string or undefined
error_tab_org.description: [error] user tried to create a Tab with invalid org value

error_tab_unexpected_keys.description: [error] user tried to create a Tab with some not supported properties

error_tab_url.message: URL must be a non-empty string
error_tab_url.description: [error] user tried to create a Tab without a url

error_tab_url_saved.message: A Tab with this URL has already been saved!
error_tab_url_saved.description: [error] The user tried to save an already favourited Tab

error_tabcontainer_constructor.message: Use TabContainer.create() instead of new TabContainer()
error_tabcontainer_constructor.description: [error] tell the developer how to use the TabContainer class

error_translationservice_constructor.message: Use TranslationService.create() instead of new TranslationService()
error_translationservice_constructor.description: [error] tell the developer how to use the TranslationService class

error_unknown_message.description: an unknown message has been received from a listener

error_unknown_request.description: [error] Generic error after getting a message which was not recognized

error_useless_remove.message:
Cannot remove:
Cannot remove a page that has not been saved before
error_useless_remove.description: [error] the user tried to remove a page that was not saved yet

error_useless_save.message:
Cannot save:
This page has already been saved!
error_useless_save.description: [error] the user tried to save a page that was already saved

extension_description.message: Create and manage custom Tabs in the available space on Salesforce Lightning Setup page.

flows.description: [default-tab] Label for the default Flows Tab

general.description: Label for the general settings category

import_duplicate_description.message:
Duplicate tabs will be ignored.
Two tabs are considered duplicates if they have the same URL.
import_duplicate_description.description: [import] description of what the import process does

import_invalid_file.message:
Invalid file type.
Only JSON files are supported.
import_invalid_file.description: [error] the file used for import is not a JSON

import_successful.description: [import] import was completed. After this, a number of how many records have been imported will be shown

insert_another.description: [error-open-other-org-modal] message for when the user inserts the same org in the modal

insert_another_org.message:
The inserted Org is the current one!
Please insert another Org.
insert_another_org.description: [error-open-other-org-modal] message for when the user inserts the same org in the modal

insert_valid_org.description: [error-open-other-org-modal] message for when the user inserts a wrong url in the modal

italic.description: Font style option for italic text

login_to_salesforce.description: [notSalesforceSetup] call to action on a button to redirect the user to a $salesforce_login page

mycustomorg.description: placeholder for the Update Tab modal

no_manifest_github.message: Invalid or missing GitHub homepage_url in manifest
no_manifest_github.description: The homepage_url key of the manifest does not use a GitHub link

no_match.description: [error] in salesforce when the switch cannot match the requested action

nss_invalid_url.description: [notSalesforceSetup] a URL which is not valid

nss_not_setup_page.message: This is not a $salesforce_lightning Setup page.
nss_not_setup_page.description: [notSalesforceSetup] the user is not on a Salesforce page.

open_here.description: [open-other-org-modal] radio button to let the user open in the same browser tab

open_new_tab.description: [open-other-org-modal] radio button to let the user open in a new browser tab.

open_settings.description: [popup] button to redirect to the settings page

open_setup.description: [notSalesforceSetup] call to action on a button to redirect the user to a $salesforce_setup page

opt_automatic_open_login.message: Automatically open $salesforce_login page when clicking on the popup while not on a Salesforce page.
opt_automatic_open_login.description: [setting] when the user opens the popup while on a random website

opt_automatic_open_setup.message: Automatically open $salesforce_setup page when clicking on the popup while on a Salesforce page.
opt_automatic_open_setup.description: [setting] when the user opens the popup while on a Salesforce website

opt_en_default.description: Default language option of the extension

opt_keep_tabs_left.message: Keep favourite Tabs on the left of Home and Object Manager.
opt_keep_tabs_left.description: Toggle to pin favorite Tabs to the left side of the navigation bar

opt_link_new_browser.message: Always open links in a new browser tab.
opt_link_new_browser.description: [setting] when the user clicks on a favourite Tab, open it in a new browser tab

opt_no_release_notes.message: Do not show update release notes.
opt_no_release_notes.description: [setting] let the user prevent the extension from showing release notes after it is updated

opt_open_login_same_tab.message: Always open $salesforce_login page in the same tab when clicking on the popup.

opt_open_setup_same_tab.message: Always open $salesforce_setup page in the same tab when clicking on the popup.

opt_pick_language.description: [setting] label to propt the user to pick their preferred language

opt_prevent_analytics.message: Prevent use of Simple Analytics (do not show up in user counts).
opt_prevent_analytics.description: [setting] let the user prevent them from sending anonymous analytics

opt_prevent_lightning_navigation.message: Prevent use of Lightning Navigation (faster loading when in use).
opt_prevent_lightning_navigation.description: [setting] do not allow Lightning Navigation with explanation of feature

opt_same_tab_popup.message: page in the same tab when clicking on the popup.
opt_same_tab_popup.description: [setting] prevent opening a new browser tab

opt_sf_lang_cookies.description: Option to use Salesforce‚Äôs language setting. Tho use this option, users must allow the extension to read Salesforce cookies.

opt_skip_link_detection.message: Skip automatic check of Salesforce Id.
opt_skip_link_detection.description: [setting] when the favourites a Tab, prevent checking if there's an Id in the link that's being saved.

or_drop.description: [import] let the user move files with their mouse and release them

overwrite_tabs.description: [label] delete all saved Tabs during import process

preserve_org_tabs.description: [label] keep all org-specific Tabs during import process

remove_tab.description: [alt] alternative text when pictures do not work

req_downloads_open_popup.message: Please open the extension popup from the extenions menu of your browser.
req_downloads_open_popup.description: [toast] ask the user to click on the extension popup to continue

req_downloads_perm_header.message:
Please enable the Downloads permission
to start the requested Export.
req_downloads_perm_header.description: [req_permission] call to action to enable downloads permission

req_downloads_perm_paragraph.message: This operation will only be requested once.

req_permissions_dont_ask.description: [req_permission] label when the user does not want to allow permissions permanently

req_permissions_header.message:
Please allow us to access
$salesforce_setup pages automatically.
req_permissions_header.description: [req_permission] header of the page to request permissions

req_permissions_paragraph.message:
If you want, you may have your favourite Tabs appear
as soon as you navigate to a $salesforce_setup page
without having to click this extension every time.
req_permissions_paragraph.description: [req_permission] text to explain why the permissions are being requested

required.description: [input] marks an input field as mandatory

required_info.description: [modal] tells the user that some info is mandatory

save.description: Apply changes and store them in memory

save_tab.description: [alt] alternative text when pictures do not work

tab_explain.description: [error] explains how a Tab should be constructed

tab_org.description: the Org property of the Tab, if it's for a single Salesforce Organization

tab_url.description: the URL property of the Tab, where it points to

underline.description: Decoration style option to underline Tab text

update_available.description: a new update for the extension is available

upload.description: [import] let the user browse through their files and pick the right one

users.description: The name of the page related to ManageUsers/home
